snippet.title: REKA - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description:
Explore the forests and more of REKA, and see gameplay, like building elements and exploration, in this latest trailer for the upcoming game. In REKA, you play as an aspiring Slavic witch under the tutelage of Baba Yaga and embark on a journey to master the art of witchcraft - all while traveling the countryside with your companion cottage: a colossal, evergrowing chicken-legged home! Roam forests and swamps, collect plants, craft magical supplies for villagers, and customize your evergrowing home over the course of your adventure. REKA will be available on PC in 2024.

#IGN #SoG #Gaming
